fields_of_interest: Budget, Trade, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Transport

organisation_name: NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF TRAVEL AGENCIES - ROMANIA (ANAT)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: ANAT has more than 500 active members - travel agencies and organizers, totaling over 80% of market turnover of travel services and travel packages, and associate members such as tourism promotion offices, airlines and transport companies, insurance companies, rent-a-car, hotels and restaurants, other associations in tourism.
goals__remit: ANAT is the trade association of travel agencies in Romania. It represents their professional and trade interests at regional, national and european level.
